actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to extend to certain Federal law enforcement and firefighter personnel who were reemployeed annuitants on July 12, 1974, the benefits provided to other Federal law enforcement and firefighter personnel under the act of July 12, 1974.

summary.text: Extends to Federal law enforcement and firefighter personnel who were reemployed annuitants on July 12, 1974, the benefits provided to other Federal law enforcement and firefighter personnel under the Act of July 12, 1974 with respect to computation of annuities.

titles.title: A bill to extend to certain Federal law enforcement and firefighter personnel who were reemployeed annuitants on July 12, 1974, the benefits provided to other Federal law enforcement and firefighter personnel under the act of July 12, 1974.
